description: HTML Generator Sample PageOur iKlear Micro-Chamois Polishing Cloth is a high quality, optical-grade micro-fiber polishing cloth. Made from the highest quality micro-fiber materials, our Micro-Chamois Polishing Cloth is ultra-soft and will not scratch your screen when used in conjunction with our iKlear Screen Cleaner. Our Micro-Chamois Polishing Cloth is ideal for cleaning your iPod, Digital Camera, and any surface requiring a fine micro-fiber cloth. Each cloth is washable and reusable and will last hundreds of cleanings. iKlear is the only cleaner Recommended by Apple Tech Support and used by Apple Care. iKlear and Klear Screen's Polishing Cloths are used by leading Professionals and Corporations including CNN, ESPN, and more.
title: iKlear Micro Chamois Kloth for iPad, iPhone, Galaxy, LCD, Plasma TV, Computer Monitor and Keyboard (Cloth and Wipes)
